```{python}
import os
os.chdir("..")
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd
from pygam import LinearGAM, s, f
```

```{python}
df = pd.read_stata("data/processed/empleados.dta")
```

```{python}
df2 = df[df["log_employment_avg"].notnull() & df["log_in_labor_force"].notnull() & df["empleo_pr"].notnull()]
gam = LinearGAM(s(0) + s(1) + f(2)).fit(df2[["log_in_labor_force", "empleo_pr"]].values, df2[["log_employment_avg"]].values)
```

```{python}
gam = LinearGAM(s(0) + s(1) + f(1)).fit(df2[["log_in_labor_force"]].values, df2[["log_employment_avg"]].values)
```
